name: fatuousness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality of being stupid, not correct, or not carefully thought about: With astonishing fatuousness, he defended his actions. She emphasized the fatuousness of his claim. See
fatuous
More examplesFewer examplesHe criticized the essential fatuousness of the whole project.With his social climbing, bragging and all-round fatuousness, he's utterly loathsome.I never cease to be amazed by the fatuousness of popular culture in this country.
